page.title: 08Yarlet Hall School
page.content: Each lesson is 40 minutes long,so on a normalweekday(Monday,Tuesday,Thursday and Friday)there are 3 lessons from 9am to 11 am,then a half hour's break and finally two more lessons before lunch at 1 pm.After lunch,there is a 30 minute reading prep.In the two winter games are then played:in the Christmas term,football and in the Easter term rugger for the older boysand football for the younger ones.There are two afternon lessons either before or after games.In the summer term the main game is cricket.Each evening on the first five days of the week,there is a 40 minute period of prep.Boys go to bed from between 6.45 and 8.20 with lights out from about 8pm to9.30.The great majority of boys are boarders,about 25 being dayboys.
